pages.text: $(bgreen)Butter Pult$() is perfect for buying lottery tickets, even though he never does such a corrupting virtue.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)275$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Normal$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)range attack$() plant that throws $(bred)one butter$() that can $(bred)stun enemy but low damage$() every 3 seconds to attack enemy.
$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will throw $(bred)powered butter$() to $(l)all surrounding enemies$().
